org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf

Interface InputPreProcessor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseInputPreProcessor, BinomialSamplingPreProcessor, CnnToFeedForwardPreProcessor, CnnToRnnPreProcessor, ComposableInputPreProcessor, FeedForwardToCnnPreProcessor, FeedForwardToRnnPreProcessor, MyCustomPreprocessor, ReshapePreProcessor, RnnToCnnPreProcessor, RnnToFeedForwardPreProcessor, UnitVarianceProcessor, ZeroMeanAndUnitVariancePreProcessor, ZeroMeanPrePreProcessor

    public interface InputPreProcessor
extends java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Input pre processor used for pre processing input before passing it to the neural network.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      INDArray backprop(INDArray output, int miniBatchSize)
      Reverse the preProcess during backprop.
      InputPreProcessor clone() 
      InputType getOutputType(InputType inputType)
      For a given type of input to this preprocessor, what is the type of the output?
      INDArray preProcess(INDArray input, int miniBatchSize)
      Pre preProcess input/activations for a multi layer network

    • Method Detail

      • preProcess

        INDArray preProcess(INDArray input,
                    int miniBatchSize)
        Pre preProcess input/activations for a multi layer network
        Parameters:
        input - the input to pre preProcess
        miniBatchSize -
        Returns:
        the processed input

      • backprop

        INDArray backprop(INDArray output,
                  int miniBatchSize)
        Reverse the preProcess during backprop. Process Gradient/epsilons before passing them to the layer below.
        Parameters:
        output - which is a pair of the gradient and epsilon
        miniBatchSize -
        Returns:
        the reverse of the pre preProcess step (if any)

      • clone

        InputPreProcessor clone()

      • getOutputType

        InputType getOutputType(InputType inputType)
        For a given type of input to this preprocessor, what is the type of the output?
        Parameters:
        inputType - Type of input for the preprocessor
        Returns:
        Type of input after applying the preprocessor
